price: 又奉命说：“你们当谨守拜功，当敬畏他〔安拉〕。他就是将来要集合你们的。
arabic: وَأَنۡ أَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّقُوهُۚ وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wa-an aqīmū al-ṣalata wa-ittaqūhu wahuwa alladhī ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
